nodes.text: Bolma were reptiles that lived on Dathomir. They grazed in herds. Generally they were docile beasts, but elder males could be aggressive. Their physiology was almost exactly like a dewback, save two short shoulder spikes, and stubby eye stalks. Though primarily native to Dathomir, bolma were known to also live on Endor's forest moon.
Bolma appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
